sentence.Network_en: A strange and motley set they were, these friends of the Chevalier.

sentence.Network_en: Chevalier de Danceny expects you at dawn tomorrow at this location.
sentence.Network_cn: 德斯奈·席瓦里哀希望你明早在这个地方见他.

sentence.Network_en: By the way, Sergeant Chevalier sends you his kind regards.
sentence.Network_cn: 顺便说一下, 谢瓦利埃警官向你问候.
